headline: 3 "Top Picks" From Wall Street That Are Magnificent Buys Right Now
summary: Another is a building products and controls company that's outperforming expectations.  UBS analyst Amit Mehrotra recently added Honeywell International (NASDAQ: HON) to his list of "top picks," which also includes industrials Johnson Controls (NYSE: JCI) and 3M (NYSE: MMM).  Simply put, Honeywell has the potential to outperform over the near and long term.

headline: Jane's March 2025 Retirement Income Update: Tariff Turmoil Creates A Buying Opportunity
summary: With AVGO buys, 10 dividend hikes, and a shift to preferreds, March trading balanced income growth and downside protection. Find out what drove the changes.
